roleset.name: to undo a ban

role.descr: action currently prohibited by ban, soon to be unbanned action
secondary agent, person unbanned from doing arg1 when separate

example.name: unban-v: Args 0 & 1
example.text: ...hoping the government will be encouraged to take further steps, such as freeing Nelson Mandela, the most prominent ANC figure, and PRO unbanning the organization.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: They unbanned him from professionally competing.

example.name: un-banning
example.text: But the unconditional release of the seven leaders , who once formed the intellectual and organizational core of the ANC , is a de facto un-banning of the movement and the rebirth of its internal wing .

roleset.note: UNBAN-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire, comparison to ban.01. (from unban.01-v)
